price: 116. C’est alors que Nous dîmes aux Anges : « Prosternez-vous devant Adam ! » Ils se prosternèrent tous, sauf Iblîs qui refusa (d’obéir).
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'nā lil'malāikati us'judū liādama fasajadū illā ib'līsa abā
